author: SciShow
description:
Visit https://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free and get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

In 2025, researchers announced a first of its kind breakthrough: They'd created a customized gene editor made for just one person. And it probably saved this tiny infant from a devastating liver disease. Here's how CRISPR saved a baby's life.

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

title: CRISPR Just Saved a Baby’s Life… Millions Could Follow
